column4: if I install Ubuntu on a PC with 1 hard disk containing 1 partition, is it possible to keep certain files from that disk without moving them off the PC?
use gparted to resize your partition to create free space before you install
resizing partionts doesn't absolve you frm having backups. you MUST have backups of your data
it's not unique data, only the result of a long calculation that I'd have to redo
